description: Ensures components adhere to WCAG guidelines by adding ARIA attributes, semantic HTML, and focus management.

inputs.name: target_file
inputs.description: Path to the component file to enhance accessibility for.

inputs.name: a11y_concerns
inputs.description: List of accessibility concerns to address (e.g., 'keyboard_navigation', 'aria_labels', 'color_contrast').

inputs.name: element_selectors
inputs.description: CSS selectors to identify elements needing a11y improvements, e.g., {'button': ['submit_button']}

outputs.name: modified_files
outputs.description: List of files that were modified for accessibility improvements.
